# Axentra - Custom API Development & Backend Solutions

## Company Overview

Axentra is a solo API development consultancy specializing in custom backend solutions for modern applications. I help businesses transform their ideas into reality by building robust, scalable API systems that solve integration challenges, optimize performance, and enable growth.

## Mission & Vision

**Mission:** Turn Your App Ideas Into Reality
I exist to help businesses overcome backend technical challenges that slow down innovation. By providing expert API development services, I enable companies to focus on their core business while I handle the complex backend infrastructure.

**Vision:** To be the trusted API development partner for businesses seeking reliable, performant backend solutions with direct expert communication and no overhead.

## Core Value Proposition

### Why Choose Axentra

1. **Solo Expert Developer:** Direct communication with the actual developer - no project managers, no miscommunication, no overhead costs passed to you.

2. **Performance-First Approach:** Every API I build is optimized for speed, reliability, and scalability from day one, preventing costly refactoring later.

3. **Integration Specialist:** Expert at connecting disparate systems, third-party APIs, and legacy infrastructure seamlessly.

4. **Documentation Excellence:** Comprehensive API documentation that enables your team to work efficiently and onboard new developers easily.

5. **Stockholm-Based, Globally Serving:** Local presence in Sweden with the capability to serve clients worldwide through remote collaboration.

## Services Offered

### Core Specialties

**Custom API Development**
- REST API design and implementation
- REST API architecture planning for scalability
- Authentication and authorization systems
- Rate limiting and security implementation
- Comprehensive API documentation

**System Integration**
- Third-party API integration (payment gateways, cloud services, etc.)
- Legacy system modernization and API wrapping
- Webhook implementation and event-driven architecture
- Database integration and optimization
- Microservices orchestration

**API Maintenance & Support**
- Performance monitoring and optimization
- Bug fixes and security updates
- API versioning and migration strategies
- Load testing and bottleneck resolution
- 24/7 monitoring setup and alerts

### Technical Expertise

**API Technologies**
- REST API design and implementation
- OpenAPI/Swagger specification
- OAuth 2.0, JWT authentication
- API versioning and documentation
- Event-driven architectures

**Backend Frameworks**
- Go (Gin, Echo, Fiber) - Primary
- Node.js (Express, Fastify) - Secondary

**Database Systems**
- PostgreSQL
- MongoDB
- Redis
- Firebase Firestore
- Supabase

**Cloud & Infrastructure**
- Railway
- Firebase
- Supabase
- Docker
- CI/CD pipelines

**Integration Tools**
- Webhook implementation
- Third-party API integrations
- Real-time synchronization
- Error handling and retry logic
- Rate limiting and caching

## Portfolio & Expertise Areas

### Industry Experience

**E-commerce & Marketplaces**
- Multi-vendor marketplace APIs
- Inventory management systems
- Payment processing integrations
- Order fulfillment workflows
- Real-time pricing and availability

**Financial Services**
- Banking API integrations
- Payment gateway implementations
- Transaction processing systems
- Compliance and audit trails
- Real-time financial data feeds

**Healthcare & MedTech**
- HIPAA-compliant API systems
- Patient data management
- Appointment scheduling systems
- Medical device integrations
- Telemedicine platforms

**IoT & Connected Devices**
- Device management APIs
- Real-time data ingestion
- Time-series data processing
- Command and control systems
- Analytics and monitoring dashboards

**SaaS Platforms**
- Multi-tenant architectures
- Subscription management
- Usage-based billing systems
- Advanced permission systems
- White-label API solutions

### Recent Project Types

**High-Performance APIs**
- Handling millions of requests per day
- Sub-100ms response times
- Horizontal scaling strategies
- Caching and CDN integration
- Database query optimization

**Complex Integrations**
- 20+ third-party service integrations
- Data transformation and mapping
- Error handling and retry logic
- Circuit breaker patterns
- Monitoring and alerting

**Real-Time Systems**
- WebSocket implementations
- Server-sent events (SSE)
- Live data streaming
- Collaborative features
- Push notifications

## Pricing Models

### Flexible Engagement Options

**1. Hourly Rate - $100/hour (ex. tax)**
- Perfect for consultations and assessments
- Code reviews and optimization
- Bug fixes and small features
- Technical advisory services
- No minimum commitment

**2. Fixed Price Projects - Starting at $8,000 (ex. tax)**
- Complete API development projects
- Clearly defined scope and deliverables
- Milestone-based payment structure
- Includes documentation and testing
- 30-day post-launch support

**3. Monthly Retainer - $7,500/month (ex. tax)**
- Ongoing API maintenance and support
- Priority response time (within 4 hours)
- Regular performance optimization
- Security updates and monitoring
- Up to 80 hours per month

**4. Enterprise Solutions - Custom Pricing**
- Large-scale API architecture design
- Team augmentation and mentoring
- Long-term strategic partnerships
- Custom SLA agreements
- Dedicated support channels

### What's Included

**All Projects Include:**
- Comprehensive API documentation
- Postman/Insomnia collections
- Unit and integration tests
- Deployment scripts and CI/CD setup
- Knowledge transfer session

**Additional Services:**
- API security audits
- Performance optimization consulting
- Architecture reviews
- Team training workshops
- Emergency support packages

## Development Process

### 1. Discovery & Planning
- Initial consultation to understand requirements
- Technical feasibility assessment
- Architecture design and technology selection
- Project scope and timeline definition
- Cost estimation and agreement

### 2. Design Phase
- API specification creation (OpenAPI/Swagger)
- Database schema design
- Integration mapping
- Security strategy planning
- Documentation structure setup

### 3. Implementation
- Iterative development with regular updates
- Test-driven development approach
- Continuous integration setup
- Code reviews and quality assurance
- Regular progress demonstrations

### 4. Testing & Optimization
- Comprehensive testing suite
- Load testing and performance tuning
- Security vulnerability scanning
- Integration testing with third-party services
- User acceptance testing support

### 5. Deployment & Launch
- Production environment setup
- Monitoring and alerting configuration
- DNS and SSL certificate setup
- API versioning strategy
- Go-live support and monitoring

### 6. Post-Launch Support
- 30-day warranty period
- Performance monitoring
- Bug fixes and minor adjustments
- Documentation updates
- Knowledge transfer to your team

## Working Methodology

### Communication & Collaboration
- Direct developer communication via email/Slack
- Weekly progress updates
- Shared project dashboard
- Version control with Git
- Transparent time tracking

### Quality Assurance
- Code review on every commit
- Automated testing pipeline
- Performance benchmarking
- Security best practices
- Documentation-first approach

### Technology Standards
- RESTful design principles
- SOLID principles and clean code
- Industry-standard authentication
- Comprehensive error handling
- Scalability-first architecture

## Why Work With Axentra

### Direct Benefits
- **No Middlemen:** Work directly with the developer
- **Cost-Effective:** No agency overhead or markup
- **Flexible:** Adapt quickly to changing requirements
- **Experienced:** Years of API development expertise
- **Reliable:** Consistent delivery and communication

### Technical Excellence
- **Best Practices:** Industry standards and patterns
- **Performance:** Optimized for speed and efficiency
- **Security:** Built-in security from the ground up
- **Scalability:** Ready for growth from day one
- **Maintainability:** Clean, documented, testable code

### Business Value
- **Faster Time-to-Market:** Efficient development process
- **Reduced Risk:** Proven methodologies and testing
- **Future-Proof:** Scalable and maintainable solutions
- **Cost Savings:** Efficient resource utilization
- **Competitive Advantage:** High-performance APIs

## Get Started

Ready to build your API solution? Contact me for a free consultation where we'll discuss your requirements, explore technical solutions, and create a roadmap for your project. I typically respond within 24 hours and can start new projects within 1-2 weeks.
